summary: Eddie thinks it is time for his father to remarry. However, in his opinion his father's taste in women leaves much to be desired. He believes the girl next door would be a far better choice...
cast: Glenn Ford|Shirley Jones|Stella Stevens|Dina Merrill|Roberta Sherwood|Ron Howard|Jerry Van Dyke|Carol Andreson|Ellen Atterbury|Christopher Barrey|Leslie Barringer|John Barton|Kimberly Beck|Rodney Bell|Barbara Brent|William Burnside|Boyd Cabeen|Gene Coogan|Kelly Corcoran|Bill Cord|Joanne Courtney|Lucille Curtis|Tom Curtis|John Damler|James Drake|Leslie Farrell|Don Fenwick|Fred Fisher|Marilyn Gladstone|Billy Halop|John Hart|John Hiestand|Mark Houston|Clint Howard|Rance Howard|Ron Kennedy|Don Lanning|John LaSalle|Mary LeBow|Margie Liszt|Sean MacGregor|Jean MacRae|Mike Marshall|Lee Meriwether|Suzanne Noel|Ron Nyman|Patrick O'Moore|Murray Pollack|Betsy Robinson|Gene Roth|Vito Scotti|Andrew Stevens|Dick Whittinghill|Robert B. Williams
title: El noviazgo del padre de Eddie
